alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 8:29PM CDT until June 18 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Rankin County in central Mississippi... Southeastern Hinds County in central Mississippi... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 829 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Byram, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Jackson and Whites around 835 PM CDT. Richland and Florence around 845 PM CDT. Pearl, Flowood and Monterey around 855 PM CDT. Brandon around 905 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
